info.name: rhombic dodecahedron roofs
info.description:
Building a [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rhombic_dodecahedron]Rhombic Dodecahedron[/url] by putting "roofs" (pyramids) on a cube.
Inspired by a drawing seen in the book Mathematical Snapshots (Kalejdoskop matematyczny) by Hugo Steinhaus.
